comment: She's okay. As far as KSU 1101 teachers go, I hear a lot of horror stories of teachers worse than her. easy class, got a B+ without ever studying. Study and you'll have an A.
Professor Law was my favorite professor my first semester. Hands down.
TAKE HER. seriously. she's great. she is so sweet and makes the course so easy. seriously. just take her class.

Prof. Law is a wonderful teacher! She is friendly, approachable, and always willing to help out. Though attendance isn't mandatory, is it VERY helpful. The class isn't a breeze but it isn't impossible. The only thing I disliked were the group projects. Her tests can be very tricky too; read the material!!!

Mrs. Law is awesome. She is very sweet, nice, funny, and a fun teacher. She is pretty lenient on grading and the tests are easy, but it would still be a good idea to attend her class. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!! :)

Mrs. Law is so sweet. She was my favorite professor. This class is easy if you read the articles and the common reader and attend class regularly. Her class is not a joke, you have projects and tests and campus events. Take her if you want a young and fun teacher for the BORING seminar class. She makes it fun.

Professor Law is such a sweet lady. She is always upbeat, so I really enjoyed her class. You do have to read alot of articles in this class, but she goes over all of them. There are a couple of group projects and one big project at the end that you have to do by yourself. Make sure you read Outcasts United if you decide to take this class!!
She is so sweet ! She really makes sure that you understand the material and has creative ways of teaching freshman. Overall the class is an easy A if you come to class and do the work .

She's a very nice person, but don't walk into this class thinking that there will be no work involved at all. You've got a paper, a speech, group presentations, 3 tests, 5 event summaries. It's not a joke simply because it's a freshman seminar. I'd recommend her!
